```py
>> KM.coords([q1, q2, q3])
>> KM.speeds([q1d, q2d, q3d]) 
```

```py
    >>> from sympy.physics.mechanics import dynamicsymbols
    >>> x = dynamicsymbols('x')
    >>> expr = x.diff() + x
    >>> sub_dict = {x: 1}
    >>> expr.subs(sub_dict)
    Derivative(1, t) + 1 
    ```

```py
>>> from sympy.physics.mechanics import msubs
>>> msubs(expr, sub_dict)
Derivative(x(t), t) + 1 
```
